title: Mass. State Police report fake account impersonating trooper
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Massachusetts State Police warn against a fake Instagram account impersonating a female state trooper with over 100,000 followers.
The account features artificially generated images of a trooper in a Massachusetts uniform and links to an OnlyFans account.
A similar fake account impersonates a Santa Monica officer and is under investigation by social media platforms.

title: In Patriots territory, Seahawks fans find a home base for the Super Bowl
author: Samantha Genzer
bullets: Alma Cantina and White Bull Tavern hosted a Seahawks watch party for Boston fans on Super Bowl Sunday.
Joshua Kasanoff, Alma Cantina's general manager, confirmed over 100 reservations for Seahawks fans.
The Boston Seahawks Fan group, started by Brenna Stuart, has grown to regularly host large watch parties.

title: Watch: Patriots’ Stefon Diggs shoved to the ground as punches fly during sideline scuffle
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: Patriots' Stefon Diggs was shoved by Seattle's Josh Jobe during a sideline altercation; no penalties or ejections followed.
The scuffle escalated when Jobe allegedly threw punches; teammates intervened to separate the players.
Diggs, facing legal charges from a December incident, has his arraignment scheduled for Feb. 13.

title: Green Line service suspended between Park Street and Government Center after train derails
author: Carson Lyle
bullets: A Green Line train derailed at Park Street station, suspending service between Park Street and Government Center stations.
The derailed trolley was rerailed at 6:43 p.m., but service remained suspended for inspections and platform repairs.
MBTA recommended riders use the Orange Line between Park Street and Government Center during the service disruption.

title: ‘Good Will Dunkin’: Watch Ben Affleck, Tom Brady, Jennifer Aniston, and more in 2026 Super Bowl commercial
author: Kevin Slane
bullets: Ben Affleck stars in Dunkin's 2026 Super Bowl ad, parodying 'Good Will Hunting' with a '90s sitcom theme.
The commercial, called 'Good Will Dunkin,' features Tom Brady, Jennifer Aniston, and stars from popular '90s sitcoms.
The ad aired just before halftime during Super Bowl LX, blending humor with nostalgic TV references.

title: Here’s Ann Michael Maye’s custom look for Super Bowl Sunday
author: Samantha Genzer
bullets: Ann Michael Maye, wife of Patriots QB Drake Maye, wore a custom Patriots jacket to Super Bowl LX.
The jacket was designed by Kristin Juszczyk, wife of 49ers star Kyle Juszczyk, and was showcased on Instagram.
Ann Michael Maye gained social media fame during the 2025 NFL season with viral baking videos and a new baking show.

title: Fall River man shot dead by police after shooting 2 officers, DA says
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Nigel Vaughn, 40, was fatally shot by Fall River police after allegedly shooting two officers during a confrontation.
The incident followed a 911 call about a firearm in a vehicle; Vaughn allegedly resisted officers during a frisk.
Officers shot Vaughn, who had a modified automatic Glock; he was pronounced dead at a hospital.

title: Man charged with motor vehicle homicide after woman, 70, killed in New Bedford crash
author: Carson Lyle
bullets: Andrew Johansen, 34, charged with motor vehicle homicide by OUI, after crash kills one and injures another in New Bedford.
Mary Patzsensky, 70, killed and another woman injured after Johansen's vehicle slid on ice onto a sidewalk, hitting them.
Johansen's bail set at $5,000; conditions include GPS monitoring, curfew, and alcohol-free requirement if posted.

title: 2 Framingham police officers off the force after misconduct probe, department says
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Two unnamed Framingham police officers are no longer employed following an internal misconduct investigation.
The misconduct investigation found violations of departmental policies; no criminal charges have been filed yet.
The investigation has been referred to the Middlesex County DA and the Massachusetts POST Commission for further review.

title: Super Bowl 2026: Watch Charlie Puth perform the National Anthem
author: Kevin Slane
bullets: Charlie Puth performed the National Anthem at Super Bowl LX in Santa Clara, California.
The performance occurred before the game between the New England Patriots and Seattle Seahawks at Levi's Stadium.
Puth's performance concluded a pregame lineup including Coco Jones, Brandi Carlile, and Green Day.
